about_the_game:
An unknown virus is been changing people into bloodthirsty zombies. Many fled to the largest bunker in the world, house to a laboratory where the virus is being investigated. Most of the survivors hibernated in the bottom levels of the bunker. Unfortunately, during an attempt to isolate the pathogen from infected blood samples, one of the scientists from the team becomes infected himself. The bunker becomes a zombie lair, together with all the hibernated people. A year afterwards, due to a malfunction, some of the hibernation chambers open on their own.

Death In The Bunker is a first person post-apocalyptic survival horror game set in the largest bunker on Earth. You play as one of the people who were hibernated in the lower levels.



With no map to lead you, you need to carve your own path through the gloomy, blood-drenched hallways. Watch out, some places might prove extremely dangerous!

  • Explore rooms, hallways, caves and ventilation shafts.
  • As you explore, watch out for dead ends and zombie lairs – they might be the last place you’ll ever see.
  • Search for keys and access cards to get into locked rooms.




    Before you go out to explore the halls, make sure you’re properly equipped for the task. Check every corner, and you might just find something that’ll come in handy for your survival. Keep your mags loaded – meeting a zombie horde head-on without a weapon ready to fire is not the best idea.

  • Upgrade your weapons by adding attachments. Death In The Bunker boasts an extensive weapon upgrading system based on attachments such as: laser sights, flashlights, suppressors, grips, etc.
  • Equip your character with the best gear possible! You can find a helmet, bulletproof vest, knee pads, glasses, gloves, shoes, pants, T-shirt, night vision goggles, and more.
  • Collect food! You will need food and water in the game to survive. The lower your hunger, thirst, and endurance bars go, the more damage you’ll receive.




    Fight for your survival! The bloodthirsty zombie might be a common sight, but it might just happen you’ll encounter other creatures too, and some of them you might have to run from. You will also encounter dangerous spots, such as contaminated labs or zombie lairs, where you should stay quiet.

  • Unarmed combat! Your most used weapon throughout the game will be your fists. Use different combos to crush your opponents. You can use your fists, elbows, knees and feet.
  • Find a melee weapon! Use those to dispose of your enemies faster and more efficiently, but watch out – your weapon might break at any time.
  • Fight from a distance! With a firearm, you will surely destroy your target in a heartbeat. But that comes at a price – there’s a high chance you’ll be heard by other zombies in the area, and you might not have enough bullets then. Firearms will definitely come in handy when fighting hordes.




    Surviving inside the bunker is next to impossible – constant hunger and thirst, zombies, dead ends, contaminated zones, and a lack of suitable weapons won’t make it any easier, especially when going at it alone! The game has a multiplayer mode, up to 6 players. When playing with friends, you increase your chances of survival.

  • Replenish your health, hunger, thirst and endurance.
  • Collect loot, upgrade your weapons, get the best gear.
  • Invite your friends into the game, try to get out of there together.
  • Avoid zombie hordes, don’t make a noise, and watch where you’re going.
  • If you die, all your gear is left with your body, and you start the game from scratch as a new character.




    There’s one goal to this game! You need to escape the bunker as fast as possible! The supplies might not last you long, and after a while you might just encounter something even worse than the zombies!
